content: each of these four sweaters uses a mini skein of sock yarn to create a traditionally-constructed sweater by the time you re finished with the set you ll know how raglan circular yoke drop shoulder and set-in sleeve sweaters are created--all without committing the time and yardage to making a human-sized sweater you ll have used stranded and intarsia colorwork techniques and become experienced at top-down vs bottom-up and seamless vs pieced construction the patterns are intended for intermediate knitters who are comfortable working flat and in the round can count their stitches and row to keep their place and can maintain gauge when working at a small gauge the finished sweaters are approximately 4 5 high x 5 5 wide each sweater uses 11-15g of sock yarn for the two sweaters with color work select strongly-contrasting one light and one dark yarns in solid semisolid or tonal colorways
